description: Free your music. Enjoy music from PC and Internet--wirelessly. The Philips Streamium network music player NP2900 with its built-in speakers gives you wireless access to both your PC music and thousands of internet radio stations around the world--all delivered by immersive LivingSound and superb FullSound technologies. It comes with a 30-day free trial of Rhapsody, so you can enjoy full-length songs on the network music player. The Philips Streamium network music player opens up a whole new world of exciting music possibilities!
title: Philips NP2900/37 WiFi Internet Radio Network Music Player with Rhapsody (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
